info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024
rating_comment: This was my 3rd time that I have stayed in this apartment. I do enjoy the quietness of this place and loved the location. The rooms aware comfortable, spacious and clean. The host was very accommodating when we had a miss communication about the check out time but at the end all workout really good. I’ll back again..

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: I was very astounded by the size of the rooms they were huge. Too tiny for the few residents we were. It was amazing and every single detail stood out. There are certain things that were out of order or wasn't great however everything else stood out.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Asif has been an excellent host, responsive and helping mindset to accommodate requests.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Rented this property for my friend's elder brother and two of his friends for 1 night only However, they enjoyed their stay a lot.
Location: Located at a very peaceful corner of Banani R/A, yet quite close to the happening part of the area. Very easy to find.
Amenities : This property offers almost everything you can ask for in your everyday life.
Host response: Mr. Asif was a very professional, responsive and helpful gentleman. He even allowed 'early check-in' at my request. Special thanks for that!
There had been a little miscommunication regarding checking-out, but it was sorted out in a very amicable manner. Thanks to Nr. Asif again.
Lastly, would surely recommend it to everyone!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: very cooperative and helpful host. unfortunately we had to cut our stay short due to a family emergency. Would definitely choose to stay there again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: You couldn't ask for a better location from which to explore Dhaka! the road itself is very quiet, but it's just a few minutes walk from the main roads and busy side streets of Banani. with great access to the airport, Gulshan and wider Dhaka!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Sorry to bother Asif a little, the house is amazing and clean!Well worth the stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Group trip
rating_comment: A place that felt like home.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Excellent host, very welcoming, and even personally reached me for additional assistance while my kids and wife were sick. Loved host's hospitality with coffee and nacho cheese at his restaurant (highly recommended to visit also, such a wonderful decoration and testy food), and breakfast. The home stages very well that my daughter was able to do a TV video shoot inside the house. Always available parking spot, caretakers were always available to support with things to buy from nearby stores, and they even helped with bages carry and any help was needed. Safest, great location to stay and go anywhere in the Dhaka city, walking distance to great shopping & food place Banani 11# road. Never experience loadshedding as they have uninterrupted backup support for electricity, which covered lift & all ACs. The airport is just 20 minutes away (unless rush hrs). only think, I would recommend updating the bathroom commode, which clogged easily as they seem old. Highly recommend this house & host.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
Great host, contacted me immediately for smooth check in. Great location in Banani, a short rickshaw ride from key places in Banani and Gulshan. The house is located in very safe place and the security guard was very friendly.
However, this house is a very dated and need maintenance. Bathrooms in the house need desperate upgrade.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023
rating_comment: Asif was a great host- very responsive and accommodating. Great location, neat and clean, secured, flexible check in..... really enjoyed the stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Enjoyed my stay. The inside of the house is cool (besides the AC) and does not get hot easily, great for warm weathers. A few issues were promptly resolved. Great Host. Thanks!

rating_comment: Extremely helpful. The house is well maintained. Provided breakfast. Supervisor and nightwatch man was cooperative. The microwave need to be replaced and some cutlery would be handy. Recommend the house for anyone.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Wonderful place to stay !!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022
rating_comment:
This is the 1st time I have stayed in this place.
I was visiting friends and family in Dhaka, so this apartment was perfect for me.
The large bed rooms, living room, kitchen and all the rooms were really clean. The apartment is really well located in the Banani and it is 10 min walking distance to road 11 for high ends shopping and well known restaurants.
My next visit to Dhaka, I am happy to stay in this apartment again and the host was Incredibly fantastic and helpful.
